sys_hub_flow.name: SUBTRIGGER_ComputerUpdate

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Do we have an established link?
Mark the update so that it begins the cooldown timer. Also update the IP for the ARP table to use.

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: No existing link requires us to start the novel device link process.

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.name: SUBTRIGGER_ComputerUpdate

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: No existing link requires us to start the novel device link process.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Do we have an established link?
Mark the update so that it begins the cooldown timer. Also update the IP for the ARP table to use.
